cmabreu.sagitarii.sdk

Class WrapperHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmabreu.sagitarii.sdk.WrapperHelper

  • public class WrapperHelper
extends Object
    This class will helps you with some useful tools. Will be passed to the processor IWrapperProcessor.processLine( LineData lineData, WrapperHelper helper ) when processing each CSV line
    Author:
    Carlos Magno O. Abreu : magno.mabreu@gmail.com
